title: Kanti, Enye iTempile?
paragraphs:
Ekuqaleni, kwakukho umqolomba.
“Makubekho ukukhanya,” yatsho itotshi.
Kwaye ngaphakathi kuloo mqolomba, abantu benza ubugcisa.
Bazipeyinta izilwanyana ababeza kuzingela;
bapeyinta ikamva labo abalinqwenelayo,
hayi ukuhombisa kodwa ukucela.
Baxhentsa,
waza umqolomba waba yitempile.

Abantu bakha iitempile.
Abantu abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo, abangazange badibane, bakha iitempile.
Xa ukhangela etempileni, ubona isipili;
imbonakalo yokuba sasingoobani kwaye sinqwenela ukuba ngabo.

Ingqiqo yakha iParthenon eAthene.
Umanyano lwakha iKaaba eMecca.
Ubunyulu bakha iTempile yaseKashi Vishwanath kwiGanges.
Ukunyamezela kugcina uDonga oluseNtshona eYerusalem.
Ukhanyiso lwakha iShwedagon Pagoda eYangon.
Kwaye ukuqhubeka kookhokho kwakha iCandomblé terreiros eSalvador.

Yonke into esetempileni isisibongozo.
Inokuba mde njengecathedral ekwenza uzive umncinci,
mnyama njengomgongxo womthi okwenza ujonge ngaphakathi;
njengentlango evala iziphazamiso,
okanye abakhazimlayo ngegolide, abathembisa into eyoyikekayo.

Iitempile ziyimikhondo kwindalo yethu yokomoya,
sikhokelela kwindawo engcwele ngaphakathi,
apho sinokuvula amandla okudala
kwingqondo yethu enzulu yokungazi.

Umzobi, njengombingeleli, isilumko, okanye i-shaman, uthatha inxaxheba kwesi sakhiwo sihlangeneyo.
Njengoko babekhe benza emqolombeni,
umsebenzi wabo kukunika umzimba kwizinto ezixabisekileyo,
ukuboleka izandla zabo kwinto efuna ukuzalwa, ukukhonza oko kumele ukuba kubekho.
bangabakhonzi, besakha;
oko kufuneka kubonakaliswe luluntu ngokwasemzimbeni.

Kodwa ayizizo zonke iindawo zetempile ezenziwe ngokulinganayo.
Eyona nxalenye ibalulekileyo kuyo nayiphi na itempile
iyakuhlala ilumnyango wayo.

Iingcango zetempile zibambe amandla azo okusika, ukutsala inxeba phakathi kwabangangena nabangenako.
Ngaloo ndlela itempile iba likrele.

Kwaye eli krele lisetyenziswe iinkulungwane,
ngokuchasene nombala wolusu,
indawo yokuzalwa,
abantu abathandanayo,
iimpahla abazinxibayo,
nokhetho abalwenzayo ngemizimba yabo.

Nditsho neetempile ezithi zamkele wonke umntu
yima phakathi kweentlanga ezingenziyo.

Itempile evulekileyo yamaBhuda eNepal
ayinakutyelelwa ngumntu wonke onqwenela ukungena.
Imida, imvume yokundwendwela kunye nezopolitiko zigqiba ukuba ngubani onokuthandaza.
Icawa yaseTshayina, i-mosque yaseYerusalem,
indawo engcwele eTibet,
bonke bema emva kweendonga ezingabonakaliyo.
Kwaye ngaphakathi kwezo ndonga ikrele lisabukhali.

Akukho tempile inokubandakanywa ngokupheleleyo.
Akukho ndawo eMhlabeni
enokugcina indalo yonke ingcwele.

Kanti bonke abantu abakhe baphila bazakha iitempile.
ubungqina bokuba into engcwele iyasimanya.
Into engaboni mida.
Into efanelwe yindawo eyeyayo.

Sinokuyakha phi itempile enjalo?
Apho iindonga zingafikeleli khona.
akukho sizwe sinokubanga,
akukho nkolo inokulawula.
Isithuba.

Ewe, le ndawo yindawo.
Nokuba abambalwa abanamalungelo ngoku bazama ukuyibanga,
kwaye nanjengoko indawo inyamezela ubunzima benkcubeko,
amandla ayo kwintelekelelo yethu indala.
Kuyinto engapheliyo phezulu, isibhakabhaka, isibhakabhaka samazulu, izulu;
ezona ziqhelekileyo eziqhelekileyo esabelana ngazo.
Isithuba sithwele isigunyaziso sezinyanya
ukusimanya.
Kunokubakho indawo engaphaya kwayo yonke imida, kubo bonke abantu kunye nazo zonke izidalwa ezineemvakalelo, itempile yokuzicingela njengeqela elinye, sikhokelwa ziinqobo esizenzayo ngoku.
Esi sisimemo sohlobo olutsha lwesithethe.
Isimemo sobugcisa sokudala itempile esithubeni, itempile eyakhiwe apho kungekho zindonga zinokufikelela khona.

Cinga ngobomi obufanele bukhunjulwe.
Chwetheza igama apha.

Kwaye siya kuyibamba.
Xa iTempile ye-Orbital ihambelana nee-antenna zethu emhlabeni,
igama liya kuphakama.
Isathelayithi iya kuyigcina kwinkumbulo yayo
kwaye uthumele umyalezo kuwe:
Namhlanje, ngeli lixa, igama owalithumelayo linyukile, lisahleli.

Itempile ye-Orbital ngumsebenzi wobugcisa,
kunye nesathelayithi.
Kwaye nangona "inetempile" egameni layo,
iba yitempile kuphela ukuba
uthatha isigqibo sokuyibona njengento enye.

Ikhona ngoku njenge-evocation,
njengaleyo yenziwa ngamagcisa
kumqolomba wokuqala.

Kwaye sisesemqolombeni,
ubumnyama obukhulu bendawo,
apho uMhlaba uyitotshi,
indawo ekukuphela kwayo esiyaziyo
ulwazi lukhona ngokuqinisekileyo.

Igcisa lisasebenza,
abantu basaxhentsa,
sikhonza ngentshukumisa efanayo neyookhokho bethu.
ukupeyinta, ukukrola, ukuyila ikamva lethu esilinqwenelayo,
kungekhona ukuhombisa kodwa ukucela,
ukuze kuzalwe itempile entsha.

Kwaye ewe,
uyamenywa ukuba udanise.
